replies.body: goddamn it msfish if only you didn't pick sej... none of this would've happened
Where's the report button when you need it.
Player ran orgs > Established orgs lmao
i really hope the players make it to the 2016 opl
Especially Ryoo and Tgun, because I reckon with a bit more improvement they could go to worlds.
So the players have to now make their own organisation or join one and that org will be in opl?
Back to winning $100 hard drives on CyberGamer, GG Team Immunity admins (lol)
Should just let IPM replace the iM roster due to organisation troubles? the players can redeem their spot next year if they're good enough, sounds fair?

Are you trolling? That's not fair at all, there is literally no blame on the players from team immunity they just got scummed by a garbage sponsor so why should they lose their place in the OPL cause of it?

Hey  iIlie, i had a read through your comment and i was highly offended that you've filed an accusation of me of trolling for my own opinon, you should read the context clearly, these players are highly capable of making their way back to OPL next year, they are very skilled and can do it with no problem, i think you should just give IPM a shot as iM have already had a shot, the players can rest, take a nice vacation, this is a problem that has been running rampant for almost a year now and by god i swear it should not continue next year, so give the roster a rest please.
I've filed a complaint to riot and the proper authority will handle you, we as Oceanic community members should not associate our selves with trolls, i'll see you later my friend.
To be fair if I had employees doing something 8 hours a day for only $2,800 a year I'd probably forget about them too.
